io.brace.lightsoutgaming.engine.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.brace.lightsoutgaming.engine.graphics.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    keeps track of sprites (textures).
    Author:
    Taz40

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int height
      the height of the sprite.
      int[] pixels
      the pixels of the screen.
      int scale
      the scale of the screen.
      private SpriteSheet sheet
      the sprite sheet the sprite is based off of.
      int width
      the width of the sprite.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite()
      creates an empty sprite.
      Sprite(int width, int height)
      creates a blank sprite withe width and height.
      Sprite(int x, int y, int scale, int width, int height, SpriteSheet sheet)
      creates a sprite from a Sprite Sheet.
      Sprite(int x, int y, int scale, int size, SpriteSheet sheet)
      creates a square sprite.
      Sprite(int x, int y, int size, SpriteSheet sheet)
      creates a square sprite with a scale of 1.

        y - the y cord of the sprite.
        scale - the scale of the sprite.
        width - the width of the sprite.
